quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易将"belt"的日常义"腰带/皮带"代入，误判为"辐射腰带"；或因"radiation"与"radio"形近，猜成"无线电带"。
quiz_item.sentence: The Earth's **radiation belt**, first detected in 1958, acts as a shield by trapping harmful high-energy particles from space.

option.definition: 辐射腰带（佩戴的防护装备）
无线电带（传输信号的波段）
辐射皮带（工业用防辐射材料）
